segments.text: It's truly exasperating to see the woman completely lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water gushing from that sink is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone ignore such a clear and present danger to their home?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally soaking in the expanding puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me disgusted to think of the water damage happening to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are right behind her, causing their own brand of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing everything important that's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a complete failure of awareness, an almost willful ignorance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the peaceful garden outside just highlights the interior chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these potential accidents unfolding simultaneously, yet she's in a bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water sloshing, but she clearly cannot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a testament to how easily one can miss the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR
